string-array.name: whats_new_items
string-array.item: Added skip next alarm option. Long press an alarm to see the option.
Added delete after dismiss option to automatically delete an alarm after it is dismissed. Found in Dismiss options.
Fixed crash when a % sign was in the alarm name.
Thanks to Aristeo Montoya for helping improve the Spanish translation.
Updated the way text-to-speech says the time and slowed down the speed at which it speaks.
Reminder notifications will be removed when an alarm goes off.
